text: Choose one response that best describes how strongly each item applies to you:
I believe that hand washing is helpful to prevent myself from COVID-19
I believe that social distancing is helpful for me to prevent myself from COVID-19
I believe that social-distancing is helpful for me to prevent  COVID-19
I believe that avoiding over-crowded places is helpful to prevent COVID-19
I believe that praying is helpful in protecting me from COVID-19
I believe that the government restrictions is helpful to prevent COVID-19
I believe that the information regarding COVID-19 is helpful for preventing COVID-19
I believe that respecting the rules and regulations set by the government is helpful for preventing COVID-19
I believe that washing my hands after coughing or sneezing will protect myself and my family
